Edges-Druid -- Male Human Seasoned Druid
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Skills (14 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d10 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: One Arm+: Suffers -4 on two-handed tasks
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Druid); Heartwood Staff; Holy/Unholy Warrior; True Form Hindrances: Arcane Sensitivity; Doubting Thomas; One Arm+ Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Druid): Has Armor Interference, Material Components+, One With Nature, Vow+, and Wilderness Stride features
Doubting Thomas: Insists on rationalizing supernatural events
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Tunic Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Falchion (d8+d8 AP 1); Guisarme (d8+d6 AP 1); Heartwood Staff (d8+d8); Morningstar (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arcane Sensitivity: -2 to resist powers
Heartwood Staff Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Heartwood Staff: Has a heartwood staff; may spend 1 PP after a hit w/it to inflict +d6 damage
Wilderness Stride: Suffers no movement penalty for difficult ground in natural terrain
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druid): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Armor Interference: In medium or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Holy/Unholy Warrior: May spend 1-4 Power Points to add an equal amount to a Soak roll
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
One With Nature: Summon Animal and Shape Change (natural animal) last 1 hr
True Form: May cast powers at -2 penalty while shape changed
